caption: I had the privilege of attending an event at this magnificent museum last night.  What it lacks in size it makes up for in Spirit, literally and figuratively.  The art and objects on display are a celebration of beauty and knowledge as much as they are part of the fabric of Irfan and the deeper spiritual traditions found in every culture.  The exhibits invite deep contemplation and a savoring of the incredible power of Human Creativity.

I will certainly visit again! This museum is an enchanting blend of art, architecture, and nature, offering a unique and inspiring experience. The building, with its lush courtyard and beautiful fountain, creates a serene and uplifting atmosphere. Inside, the exhibits feature a fascinating collection of ancient, historically significant artifacts that connect visitors to the past. The artistic layout brings these themes to life in a way that fills visitors with joy and wonder. It felt like more than just a museum—a journey through time and culture. I highly recommend experiencing this inspiring place for yourself!
The most magical grounds! Truly magnificent setting with soul inspiring artifacts. The visit was immersive, all senses and beyond engaged. Would highly recommend visiting this gem!

Just wow! its not just a museum, but a truly unique spiritual experience. The exhibits are thoughtfully curated, with a great variety of artistic styles and mediums on display. The museum's layout is easy to navigate, and the staff are friendly and knowledgeable, always ready to share insights about the collections. I also appreciated how well the space caters to visitors of all ages. A hidden gem that’s well worth the visit! I'll definitely be back.
Do you want a harmonious and peaceful visit to a place in Paris where art and culture from all over the world meet? I recommend you to visit this place.
Very impressive, unique and informative about facts that nobody have ever seen or heard
Excellent museum with a perfect Garden. Recommend to see and enjoy from the perfect ambience of the museum.
The works of art are magnificent and powerful.   I highly recommend going and signing up for the activities!
Very inspiring place for those who seeks to reach to hearth.
A must visit for people from all walks of life.

The Museum offers on 3 floors, consistent with Sufism and the inaugural exhibition, a beautiful interior experience. The building itself is a mix of old and new. In the garden, we continue the journey with the QR codes of music and meditations according to the season! It makes me want to come back in spring.
A place where anyone who wants to get to know their heart and inner self, can recharge their batteries and feel part of the world. Conveniently booked my ticket online for the visit.

Recent (opened at the end of September 2024), atypical and very interesting. In a 19th century house with a view of the Seine, very well renovated and surrounded by a garden, also restored. Is not about the history of Sufism but about Sufi arts and culture. A stunning hologram is also visible on the Sufism. Temporary exhibition of contemporary art in addition to the presentation of the permanent collection. In January 2025, I also participated in the volunteer program on the maintenance and development of the garden. Remarkable and very well organized idea: these volunteers (who participate for a few hours per month, with a flexible commitment) are supervised by a professional landscape gardener, very educational, knowledgeable about the plants planted, teaching you the right gesture, but also the history of these plants. you register as a volunteer at reception or by answering a questionnaire following a visit to the museum.

Very beautiful setting for this small museum dedicated to Sufism. Beautiful mansard house in the heart of Chatou, completely renovated which hosts a beautiful exhibition and above all a tribute to the origins of Sufism, to the spiritual journey necessary to achieve a form of wisdom, inner peace and a response to our existence on earth. Thank you very much for Azim’s explanations and wisdom. A suspended moment...

This place is a haven of peace, an enchantment: the garden, the magnificent fountain, the historical objects, the explanatory videos, the contemporary works of art,... This museum allows us to reconnect with values, with ancient wisdom which in reality is still present, it allows us to see that beyond the conditioning and painful conflicts of today, there are always wise people, great men who work for peace, who support educational values, values ​​of sharing and who encourage creativity. Thank you very much to the people who made this place possible in Chatou.

The experience offered by the museum is innovative and wonderful. I spent a delightful day there.  The works of art are magnificent and powerful.   I highly recommend going and signing up for the activities!   Good experience everyone.
Very beautiful museum allowing you to discover Sufism and its symbols. The garden and the fountain invite calm.
You need to have the exact change for the entrance fee you don't get the change.
Entrance to the museum is 9 euros and if you want to pay with 10 euros we won't give you change.
The staff is very friendly, and the garden is magnificent. I had a great time there.
Magnificent place to visit to discover the culture of Sufism.
A magical place.
